page.title: 20Alpheton
page.content: Alpheton is situated on either side of the A134 Sudbury to Bury St Edmunds road,about 6km North East of Long Melford and approximately 5km West of Lavenham.The village is divided into two sections by the A134,the larger part to the east of the main road and including 37 houses,the Jubilee village hall,public telephone kiosk and post box.Although the larger part is to the east it is not the busiest because the smaller western area is built around a thriving petrol station and cafe which are situated on a bend of the old road now used as a lay-by.The area around Alpheton is rolling open farmland and the majority of Alpheton's 245 inhabitants must either work on the land or in nearby towns.
